latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to enhance compliance with hospital price transparency requirements, and for other purposes.
ai_summary: A bill to enhance compliance with hospital price transparency requirements. A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to enhance Compliance with Hospital Price Transparency requirements, and for other purposes. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on Wednesday. It has been referred to the Senate for further consideration. The Senate is expected to take up the bill in the coming days. For more information on the bill, go to: http://www.senate.gov/health/bill-amendment-amend-public-health-service-act.
